result.title: Need Help On bipartite Graph
result.content: Given N nodes and M edges. I have to color(only 2 colors) the nodes in such a way that at least one of the connected nodes of each nodes belong to different color. What will be the maximum number of nodes of same colored ? I am not sure about the range of N,M. I was working on bipartite graph. Suddenly I noticed it but failed to manage any idea to solve it.
